name: I really want to sleep!
description:
“I want to sleep!” is a platformer where you will need to pre-plan your movements to reach the goal. Oh! But it is not so simple, you cannot control the main character, you will need to influence their mood to 

Controls
  • Place & Remove banners to affect the main character’s mood (you can use the mood board as a guide for their actions). When entering a node, they will perform the action associated with that node.
  • Tip: Happy banners move the mood up, Sad banners move the mood down, Angry banners move the mood right and Apathetic banners move the mood left.
  • Press play to start the sequence to try to reach the pillow on the other side (yes… it’s a pillow)
